resources.string:
Initial Calculation

For the first calculation, enter a number by pressing the numerical buttons, followed by an operator (+, -, *, /) button, followed by another number, followed by the equals button.

Ongoing Calculations

If another number is entered immediately after a calculation, the display is cleared and the operation is done as per an initial calculation.
If an operator (+, -, *, /), is entered immediately after a calculation, the calculation is carried out on the previous result and the newly entered number. Only one operator (+, -, *, /) can be selected for a calculation, extras operators are ignored.

Clear Button

The Clear button clears the display, and the next operation is carried out as per an initial calculation.

Back Button

The Back button clears the last character from the display, it will not clear a a previous displayed result.

Size

Up to 18 characters can be entered for a number, any extra characters are ignored.

Checking

Calculations are checked for divide by zero, and overflows. If detected the calcuation is ignored and an error message is displayed.
